body_html:
This is weird.. I am guessing maybe there is something wrong with your Visual Studio installation,
I found this error.
On my machine, stddef.h can be found at C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\Include\10.0.10240.0\ucrt
Can you try to reinstall Visual Studio 2015?

This is weird.. I am guessing maybe there is something wrong with your Visual Studio installation,
I found this error.

body:
This is weird.. I am guessing maybe there is something wrong with your Visual Studio installation,
I found [this error](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/vstudio/en-US/0f580a73-6f11-4aa6-abbe-6bf1438734c2/standard-files-stddefh-stringh-missing-in-visual-studio-2015-rc?forum=vclanguage).
On my machine, `stddef.h` can be found at `C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\Include\10.0.10240.0\ucrt`
Can you try to reinstall Visual Studio 2015?
